summary.para: Describes whether a window is occluded.

remarks.para: If the window was occluded the last time was called, the next time the render target calls , it returns D2D1_WINDOW_STATE_OCCLUDED regardless of the current window state. If you want to use CheckWindowState to check the current window state, call CheckWindowState after every EndDraw call and ignore its return value. This will ensure that your next call to CheckWindowState state returns the actual window state.
